original: 涼州西平人，曹魏官員。敗於姜維後不得以而投降蜀漢。曾試圖刺殺劉禪，但因為侍衛阻其接近而未果。後乘費禕設宴歡飲之際，刺殺費禕。
text: Xiping, Liangzhou, Cao Wei official. After defeating Jiang Wei, he could not surrender to Shu Han. He tried to assassinate Liu Chan, but failed because the guards prevented him from approaching. Later, when Fei Yi hosted a banquet, he assassinated Fei Yi.
